title: Highest Average Precipitation
description: Colombia experiences an average precipitation depth of 3240 mm per year, making it one of the wettest countries in the world as of 2021.

title: High Net Financial Flows from IMF
description: In 2020, Colombia received net financial flows from the IMF amounting to $5.22 billion, indicating significant financial engagement with the institution.

title: Low Coverage of Unemployment Benefits
description: As of 2022, only 0.15% of the Colombian population is covered by unemployment benefits and active labor market programs, one of the lowest coverages globally.

title: Low Adequacy of Social Safety Nets
description: In 2022, the adequacy of social safety net programs in Colombia was only 0.69% of the total welfare of beneficiary households, indicating limited support.

title: Low Acceptance of Domestic Violence
description: In 2015, only 3.1% of women in Colombia believed a husband is justified in beating his wife for any reason, reflecting low acceptance of domestic violence.
